text.author: Wikivoyage community (see URL)
text.title: Morgan Hill
text.p:
Morgan
Hill
is a city in
Santa Clara
County
,
California
, at the southern tip of
Silicon Valley
, in the
San Francisco Bay Area
.
Morgan
Hill is primarily an affluent residential community for Silicon Valley , as well as the seat for several high-tech companies .

p.s:
Morgan Hill sits astride US 101 , a major north-south highway that spans the Pacific coast from
San Diego
to
Seattle
.

Commercial air service is via
Mineta San Jose International Airport
, approximately 20 miles to the north .

Morgan Hill also is connected to
San Jose
and
San Francisco
by
Caltrain
service , but only during peak commute hours .

list.item:
Morgan Hill railway station
, 17300 Depot St.

p.s:
Santa Clara Valley bus service
schedule
.

list.item:
Henry Coe State Park
.
Is the largest state park in northern California .
It is open year-round for hikers , mountain bikers , backpackers , equestrians , car campers , picnickers , and photographers .

Anderson Lake County Park
, 19245 Malaguerra Ave , ☏ +1408 779-3634 .
Park office : .
It is great for hiking , running , biking , and skating on paved trails .
The lake is open for boating and fishing .
Jet-ski 's and float tubes are permitted .

Guglielmo Winery
, 1480 E Main Ave ( across from Live Oak HS ) , ☏ +1408 779-2145 .

Morgan Hill Cellars
, 1645
San Pedro Winery , ☏ +1 408-779-7389 , ✉ wines@morganhillcellars.com .

Sycamore Creek Winery
.
Located west of Morgan Hill on Sycamore Rd .

Kirigins Winery
.
Located west of Morgan Hill on Uvas Rd .

EmmaLily Vineyards
, 2105 Dahlberg Drive , Morgan Hill , CA 95037 , ☏ +14086559197 .

Seeker Vineyard
, 11755 Turlock Ave , San Martin , CA 95046 , toll-free : +1 949 370-1040 .

Cinelux theaters
( Off of Tennant Street , between Monterey and 101 ) .

p.s: Shopping areas include downtown and the Cochrane area .

list.item:
Aoi Japanese Restaurant
, 35 East Main Ave , ☏ +1408 776-7763 .
Authentic Japanese food and the service is even true Japanese style .

Betsy 's Restaurant & Lounge
, 650 Tennant Station ( in the bowling alley ) , ☏ +1408 779-3721 .
Great food and some of the best prime rib served on weekends .

China Orchid
, 16715 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 776-1714 .
Chinese food .

China Star
, 233 West Main Av , ☏ +1408 778-9898 .
Chinese food . good food and nice atmosphere .

La Choza Taqueria
, 17865 Monterey St #F ( corner of Wright St ) , ☏ +1408 782-7873 .
Mexican food .

The Capri
, 18625 Monterey St , ☏ +1408 778-5642 .
Used to be a hot spot in the 50s as a restaurant , place to dance , and a bar .
The Capri was closed and has been the host to many different restaurants .
Later it was turned into a Mexican restaurant called " El Capri " .
After El Capri closed a single taco cart going by the same name sat outside the vacant building until they moved to San Martin ( just south of Morgan Hill on Monterey Rd . ) .
Now the building that once was a hot spot in the 50s where people went to dance , drink and eat(such as my grandparents ) , it sits vacant .
This historic landmark is certainly an eye catcher and is sad to see it not being used .

El Toro Brewery
( corner of Main and Monterey ) .

Chinese food .

Condit Rd , ☏ +1408 779-8085 .

p.s:
Be careful to check for
ticks
after hiking in fields in the bay area .
There is a high rate of lyme disease transmission in the Bay Area .
If a bulls ' eye rash develops at the tick bite site , immediately seek medical help and treatment with antibiotics .
